context.description: CWPAD0001 Explanation: To use the latest adapter features, the connector version should match the latest adapter version. User Action: Run the migration wizard on the connector project to migrate the connector project to the latest adapter version.

CWPAD0002 Explanation: To use the latest adapter features, the module artifact version should match the latest adapter version. User Action: Run the migration wizard on the connector project to migrate the module to the latest adapter version.

CWPAD0003 Explanation: To use the latest adapter features, the module artifact version should match the latest adapter version. User Action: Run the migration wizard on the connector project to migrate the module to the latest adapter version.
CWPAD0004 Explanation: The service descriptor and the referenced schema versions should match. User Action: The project might be corrupt. Restore the current project from a backup version.

CWPAD0005 Explanation: The module and adapter cannot be migrated because they are not supported by the WebSphere Adapter Migration tool. User Action: For more information about migrating the module and adapter, see the migration section of your adapter documentation.
